name: meditation mantra
description:
this image was crafted from the train station in ellerslie, tāmaki makaurau.

inspired by all the times i've sat by the overpass watching the world go by - and contemplating which journey to take next.
-

These images have been a concept I have been developing since the March 2020 Covid-19 lockdown in Aotearoa - however I never had the chance to get out and capture the initial photographs until the September 2021 Covid-19 lockdown.

These were taken on the last night of Level 4 in Tāmaki Makaurau (21/09/2021) and further developed inside procreate to bring out the symmetrical entities of the night.

In total this series contains 4 1/1 NFT tokens on the Kalamint marketplace [https://kalamint.io/user/hailtree], as well as this edition of /10 tokens on the H=N marketplace.

This series was incredibly cathartic to create, and I hope that they stir something inside of you.
